Register Your Team

{include "default_salutation"} –

Constitution Day is coming up, and we're celebrating the importance of our civil liberties with a statewide Constitution, Civil Rights, and ACLU-WV trivia night!

Register your team and put your heads together to take home some civil liberties bragging rights and prizes. $20 for teams of up to five members (only one registration form per team is necessary) or register as an individual for $5 and join a team to participate.

Follow the event on our website and Facebook for updates.

We hope to see you for this fun virtual gathering!

In Solidarity,
